mapper.select: select r.rfield_name, r.metadata_field_id, r.language, r.resource_type_id, r.contenttype_id, field.element, field.qualifier, metaschema.short_id from remote2localdc r join metadatafieldregistry field on r.metadata_field_id = field.metadata_field_id join metadataschemaregistry metaschema on metaschema.metadata_schema_id = field.metadata_schema_id where isUse = 1
